Row.Text: [NEWLINE]Units that can settle new Cities may only be built in Cities with at least {1_Num} [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens.
Order this unit to found a city in its current location. It is consumed in the process.
Medieval Era unit that specializes in scouting and colonizing new lands. Unlocked by opening the Exploration social policy tree.

The Conquistador, which is only available by opening the Exploration social policy tree, is a multi-purpose unit that serves as an exceptional scout on land with extra visibility and the ability to found new cities. In the water, the Conquistador has the defensive embarkation promotion that allows it to defend itself against naval units.
